languages.text: "Дворец бунтари сожгли еще в самом начале, но губернатор, милостью Императора, жив и продолжает руководить обороной из укрепленного командного пункта".

traits.locale_text: "Дворец его благородия захватили и разрушили мятежники, но сам он милостью Императора выжил и перебрался с окружением в укрепленный штаб. Губернатор у нас человек военный, руководит подавлением мятежа. Только туда надо через город пробираться. Дело опасное".

languages.text: "The rebels burned down the palace right at the start, but the governor, by the grace of the Emperor, is still alive and continues to oversee the defence efforts from a fortified command post."
languages.original_text: "Дворец бунтари сожгли еще в самом начале, но губернатор, милостью Императора, жив и продолжает руководить обороной из укрепленного командного пункта".

traits.locale_text: "The rebels burned down the palace right at the start, but the governor, by the grace of the Emperor, is still alive and continues to oversee the defence efforts from a fortified command post."

"The rebels burned down the palace right at the start, but the governor, by the grace of the Emperor, is still alive and continues to oversee the defence efforts from a fortified command post."

languages.text: "Die Rebellen haben den Palast gleich zu Beginn niedergebrannt, doch der Gouverneur ist dank des Imperators Gnaden noch am Leben und überwacht die Verteidigung von einer befestigten Befehlszentrale aus."
languages.original_text: "The rebels burned down the palace right at the start, but the governor, by the grace of the Emperor, is still alive and continues to oversee the defence efforts from a fortified command post."

traits.locale_text: "Die Rebellen haben den Palast gleich zu Beginn niedergebrannt, doch der Gouverneur ist dank des Imperators Gnaden noch am Leben und überwacht die Verteidigung von einer befestigten Befehlszentrale aus."

languages.text: « Les rebelles ont incendié le palais dès le début de l'émeute, mais le gouverneur, loué soit l'Empereur, est toujours en vie et il continue de superviser les efforts de défense à partir de son poste de commandement fortifié. »
languages.original_text: "The rebels burned down the palace right at the start, but the governor, by the grace of the Emperor, is still alive and continues to oversee the defence efforts from a fortified command post."

traits.locale_text: « Les rebelles ont incendié le palais dès le début de l'émeute, mais le gouverneur, loué soit l'empereur, est toujours en vie et il continue de superviser les efforts de défense à partir de son poste de commandement fortifié. »

languages.text: “叛乱刚刚爆发时，那群叛军就烧毁了宫殿。不过幸好帝皇保佑，总督幸免于难，转移到了严防死守的指挥所里，继续监督防御工作。”
languages.original_text: "The rebels burned down the palace right at the start, but the governor, by the grace of the Emperor, is still alive and continues to oversee the defence efforts from a fortified command post."

traits.locale_text: “叛乱刚刚爆发时，那群叛军就烧毁了宫殿。不过幸好帝皇保佑，总督幸免于难，转移到了严防死守的指挥所里，继续监督防御工作。”

languages.text: 「反乱者は戦闘開始早々に宮殿を焼き払ったものの、皇帝の恩寵を受けた総督は、まだご存命で、要塞化した司令部から防衛活動を続けて監督していらっしゃいます」
languages.original_text: "The rebels burned down the palace right at the start, but the governor, by the grace of the Emperor, is still alive and continues to oversee the defence efforts from a fortified command post."

traits.locale_text: 「反乱者は戦闘開始早々に宮殿を焼き払ったものの、皇帝の恩寵を受けた総督は、まだご存命で、要塞化した司令部から防衛活動を続けて監督していらっしゃいます」

languages.text: «Los rebeldes quemaron el palacio nada más empezar, pero el gobernador, por la gracia del Emperador, sigue vivo y continúa supervisando los esfuerzos defensivos desde un puesto de mando fortificado».
languages.original_text: "The rebels burned down the palace right at the start, but the governor, by the grace of the Emperor, is still alive and continues to oversee the defence efforts from a fortified command post."

traits.locale_text: «Los rebeldes quemaron el palacio nada más empezar, pero el gobernador, por la gracia del Emperador, sigue vivo y continúa supervisando los esfuerzos defensivos desde un puesto de mando fortificado».

languages.text: "İsyancılar ilkin sarayı yakıp kül ettiler ama İmparator'a şükürler olsun ki valimiz hâlâ hayatta ve savunma çabalarını müstahkem bir komuta noktasından idareye devam ediyor."
languages.original_text: "The rebels burned down the palace right at the start, but the governor, by the grace of the Emperor, is still alive and continues to oversee the defence efforts from a fortified command post."

traits.locale_text: "İsyancılar ilkin sarayı yakıp kül ettiler ama İmparator'a şükürler olsun ki valimiz hâlâ hayatta ve savunma çabalarını müstahkem bir komuta noktasından idareye devam ediyor."
